Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_Payment] WHERE [payment_id] = 'K34') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_Payment] ([shop_id] ,[payment_group_id] ,[payment_id] ,[payment_alt_id] ,[payment_name] ,[payment_name_mobile] ,[payment_price_kbn] ,[payment_price] ,[usable_price_min] ,[usable_price_max] ,[mobile_disp_flg] ,[display_order] ,[valid_flg] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed] ,[user_management_level_not_use]) VALUES( '0' ,'' ,'K34' ,'' ,'atone（コンビニで翌月払い）' ,'' ,0 ,0 ,1 ,NULL ,'0' ,100 ,'0' ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー' ,'0') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_PaymentPrice] WHERE [payment_id] = 'K34') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_PaymentPrice] ([shop_id] ,[payment_group_id] ,[payment_id] ,[payment_price_no] ,[tgt_price_bgn] ,[tgt_price_end] ,[payment_price] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed]) VALUES( '0' ,'' ,'K34' ,'1' ,0 ,0 ,0 ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_Payment] WHERE [payment_id] = 'K35') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_Payment] ([shop_id] ,[payment_group_id] ,[payment_id] ,[payment_alt_id] ,[payment_name] ,[payment_name_mobile] ,[payment_price_kbn] ,[payment_price] ,[usable_price_min] ,[usable_price_max] ,[mobile_disp_flg] ,[display_order] ,[valid_flg] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed] ,[user_management_level_not_use]) VALUES( '0' ,'' ,'K35' ,'' ,'AFTEE先享後支付' ,'' ,0 ,0 ,1 ,NULL ,'0' ,101 ,'0' ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー' ,'0') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_PaymentPrice] WHERE [payment_id] = 'K35') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_PaymentPrice] ([shop_id] ,[payment_group_id] ,[payment_id] ,[payment_price_no] ,[tgt_price_bgn] ,[tgt_price_end] ,[payment_price] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed]) VALUES( '0' ,'' ,'K35' ,'1' ,0 ,0 ,0 ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM w2_MailTemplate WHERE shop_id = '0' AND mail_id = '10000091') BEGIN INSERT [w2_MailTemplate] ( [shop_id], [mail_id], [mail_name], [mail_from], [mail_to], [mail_cc], [mail_bcc], [mail_subject], [mail_body], [mail_subject_mobile], [mail_body_mobile], [mail_attachmentfile_path], [del_flg], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed], [mail_from_name], [mail_category], [auto_send_flg], [language_code], [language_locale_id], [sms_use_flg] ) VALUES ( N'0', N'10000091', N'NP決済システム通知【管理者向け】', N'pkg_mail@w2solution.co.jp', N'pkg_mail@w2solution.co.jp', N'', N'', N'NP決済システム通知', N'@@ message @@', N'', N'', N'', N'0', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), N'w2', N'', N'', N'1', N'', N'', N'0' ) END GO
